prewedding_des_1: I need you like a heart needs a beat
prewedding_des_2: Life is the flower for which love is the honey
prewedding_des_3: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage
prewedding_des_4: To be your friend was all I ever wanted; to be your lover was all I ever dreamed.
prewedding_des_5: Once in a while, right in the middle of an ordinary life, love gives us a fairy tale.
prewedding_des_6: I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this would alone.
prewedding_des_7: I don't wish to be everything to everyone, but I would like to be something to someone
prewedding_des_8: I am my beloved and my beloved is mine
prewedding_des_9: There is no such thing as a perfect man or a perfect marriage but the one I have is perfect for me.
date_des_1: These two weirdos are perfect for each other.
date_des_2: Home is wherever I'm with you.
date_des_3: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
date_des_4: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
date_des_5: Hand in hand and grow old together
date_des_6: Love is the frosting of life.
date_des_8: As endless as the ocean, as timeless as the tides.
friends_des_5: Marco, Mandy, Dorothy, Renee, Jenny, Sherrie & Charmanine
